Entries.DialogueText: Hello, farmer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello, er.

Entries.DialogueText: I've been gone so long... I feel like a stranger.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been gone so long... I feel like a stranger.

Entries.DialogueText: For me? Well, that's unexpected... But I won't say no. Thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: For me? Well, that's unexpected... But I won't say no. Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I can't read Dwarvish, but it's an interesting collector's item. Thank you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I can't read Dwarvish, but it's an interesting collector's item. Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: Heh... The rain is a blessing. A reminder that there will always be forces greater than anything conceived of by man.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh... The rain is a blessing. A reminder that there will always be forces greater than anything conceived of by man.

Entries.DialogueText: That's actually a comfort, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's actually a comfort, .

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. Nice to see you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . Nice to see you.

Entries.DialogueText: Time to head home.
Entries.DisplayPattern: to head home.

Entries.DialogueText: Standing on this beach... I feel a rare sense of peace. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Standing on this beach... I feel a rare sense of peace.

Entries.DialogueText: The ocean is a very special thing.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The ocean is a very special thing.

Entries.DialogueText: This is a great place to bond with the family. I really appreciate you fixing it up.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a great to bond with the family. I really appreciate you fixing it up.

Entries.DialogueText: Just getting some water.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just getting some water.

Entries.DialogueText: It makes a father proud to see his boy become a man. You have my heartfelt blessing. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It makes a father proud to see his boy become a man. You have my heartfelt blessing.

Entries.DialogueText: The boat ride was fun. I even got to use some of my nautical training to help navigate. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The boat ride was fun. I even got to use some of my nautical training to help navigate.

Entries.DialogueText: My apologies for the other day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My apologies for the other day.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't want any special treatment. I just want to be a normal person, like everyone else.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't want any special treatment. I just want to be a normal person, like everyone else.

Entries.DialogueText: Erm... okay. Thank you. I'll meet you there. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Erm... okay. Thank you. I'll meet you there.

Entries.DialogueText: ...! {Portrait:Love}
...Where did you find this? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Where did you find this?

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Angry}
This man... We fought together in the war, {Farmer_Name}. He was like a brother to me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This man... We fought together in the war, . He was like a brother to me.

Entries.DialogueText: But... only one of us made it back. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But... only one of us made it back.

Entries.DialogueText: He never lost his courage, though. Even in the face of death. A true hero... I'll never forget him.
Entries.DisplayPattern: He never lost his courage, though. Even in the face of death. A true hero... I'll never forget him.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for bringing me this... It means a lot to me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for bringing me this... It means a lot to me.

Entries.DialogueText: Here, take this. It's been sitting in the back of our cupboard for years, and we've never used it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, take this. It's been sitting in the back of our cupboard for years, and we've never used it.

Entries.DialogueText: Yep... It's been tightly sealed, so the flavor should still be really potent.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yep... It's been tightly sealed, so the flavor should still be really potent.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't know if I'll ever get used to being back home.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't know if I'll ever get used to being back home.

Entries.DialogueText: The peacefulness of the town feels like a mask. That's probably just me though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The peacefulness of the town feels like a mask. That's probably just me though.

Entries.DialogueText: Things haven't changed much since I've been gone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Things haven't changed much since I've been gone.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, except that you're here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, except that you're here.

Entries.DialogueText: Things haven't changed much since I've been gone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Things haven't changed much since I've been gone.

Entries.DialogueText: Except that we have a new farmer in town. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Except that we have a new er in town.

Entries.DialogueText: I feel like I'm settling back in pretty well. It's nice to have a friend in town. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel like I'm settling back in pretty well. It's nice to have a friend in town.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I lost a lot of friends in battle. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I lost a lot of friends in battle.

Entries.DialogueText: What's sad is that I can't even remember their faces.
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's sad is that I can't even remember their faces.

Entries.DialogueText: You've been here a while now, haven't you? Your farm must be thriving.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've been here a while now, haven't you? Your must be thriving.

Entries.DialogueText: To be alive is a special gift, and it comes and goes in the blink of an eye... never lose sight of that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: To be alive is a special gift, and it comes and goes in the blink of an eye... never lose sight of that.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} Kent1
Entries.DisplayPattern: # Kent1

Entries.DialogueText: I've been up since 4 o'clock... sometimes I wonder if I'll ever get back into a normal routine.$k
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been up since 4 o'clock... somes I wonder if I'll ever get back into a normal routine.

Entries.DialogueText: Sam has really grown up since I left. He's a man now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam has really grown up since I left. He's a man now.

Entries.DialogueText: I wish I could've been there for him. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish I could've been there for him.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you friends with my son?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you friends with my son?

Entries.DialogueText: You probably know him better than I do... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You probably know him better than I do...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. Are you enjoying the married lifestyle?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . Are you enjoying the married lifestyle?

Entries.DialogueText: It looks like a decent day for fishing, doesn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: It looks like a decent day for fishing, doesn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: I oughta take up fishing. It would give me something to do, keep my hands busy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I oughta take up fishing. It would give me something to do, keep my hands busy.

Entries.DialogueText: Jodi tells me you've really become a part of this community. I'm glad to hear it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Jodi tells me you've really become a part of this community. I'm glad to hear it.

Entries.DialogueText: I have trouble sleeping, so please excuse me if I seem tired.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have trouble sleeping, so please excuse me if I seem tired.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sure you can understand.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sure you can understand.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't know what to do with myself now that I'm back.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't know what to do with myself now that I'm back.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm used to having more structure in my day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm used to having more structure in my day.

Entries.DialogueText: You've got a routine to keep you busy, huh? That's a good thing.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've got a routine to keep you busy, huh? That's a good thing.

Entries.DialogueText: Too much freedom can be stifling. We all benefit from having some structure in our lives.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Too much freedom can be stifling. We all benefit from having some structure in our lives.

Entries.DialogueText: You keep quiet! Stop trying to turn me against my wife. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You keep quiet! Stop trying to turn me against my wife.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Sad}
You're absolutely right, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're absolutely right, .

Entries.DialogueText: Don't lie to me! I hate lies more than anything! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't lie to me! I hate lies more than anything!

Entries.DialogueText: Um, hello there. My name's Kent. I just got back last night... from overseas. My wife told me that a new farmer had moved in while I was gone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um, hello there. My 's Kent. I just got back last night... from overseas. My wife told me that a new er had moved in while I was gone.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I just wanted to introduce myself... I'll see you around.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I just wanted to introduce myself... I'll see you around.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}. Please, come in.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi . Please, come in.

Entries.DialogueText: Heh heh. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh heh.

Entries.DialogueText: Mmm... that crispy bass was delicious! The breading was to die for...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmm... that crispy bass was delicious! The breading was to die for...

Entries.DialogueText: I almost feel like part of the family, now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I almost feel like part of the family, now.

Entries.DialogueText: AAAAAHHHHHHH!!! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: AAAAAHHHHHHH!!!

Entries.DialogueText: That sound... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That sound...

Entries.DialogueText: You should've known that sound would remind me of the war! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You should've known that sound would remind me of the war!

Entries.DialogueText: ...I lost a lot of good friends in those bloody trenches. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I lost a lot of good friends in those bloody trenches.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Things have changed.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Things have changed.

Entries.DialogueText: (Say something to Kent) {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: (Say something to Kent)

Entries.DialogueText: Jodi's to blame... she should've known better!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Jodi's to blame... she should've known better!

Entries.DialogueText: I know you're hurting... but don't blame your wife.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know you're hurting... but don't blame your wife.

Entries.DialogueText: (Lie) Blame me... I asked for popcorn
Entries.DisplayPattern: (Lie) Blame me... I asked for popcorn

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Sad}
I'm sorry, honey. You couldn't have known the sound of popcorn would make me upset.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sorry, honey. You couldn't have known the sound of popcorn would make me upset.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm happy for an excuse to get out of the house, and take my mind off things.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm happy for an excuse to get out of the house, and take my mind off things.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm waiting for this clown to start doing something funny.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm waiting for this clown to start doing something funny.

Entries.DialogueText: Pretty disappointing.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pretty disappointing.

Entries.DialogueText: *chuckle* My son has a knack for accuracy. I wonder if he got it from me. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *chuckle* My son has a knack for accuracy. I wonder if he got it from me.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. Nice evening, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . Nice evening, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: These things don't look so tough. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: These things don't look so tough.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not a big fan of eggs, to tell you the truth.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not a big fan of eggs, to tell you the truth.

Entries.DialogueText: This open field... it makes me nervous.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This open field... it makes me nervous.

Entries.DialogueText: *whisper* Happy thoughts, Kent. Happy Thoughts.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *whisper* Happy thoughts, Kent. Happy Thoughts.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever wonder... why do we find flowers beautiful?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever wonder... why do we find flowers beautiful?

Entries.DialogueText: If Jodi and I ever have a daughter, maybe we'll name her after a flower. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If Jodi and I ever have a daughter, maybe we'll her after a flower.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, good to see you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, good to see you.

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff* ...smells are powerful for bringing back memories... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff* ...smells are powerful for bringing back memories...

Entries.DialogueText: That can be good or bad...
Entries.DisplayPattern: That can be good or bad...

Entries.DialogueText: Good evening, {Farmer_Name}. Hope you can find some time to relax before the harvest season.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good evening, . Hope you can find some to relax before the harvest .

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. Got big plans for the fall?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. Got big plans for the fall?

Entries.DialogueText: Good afternoon, {Farmer_Name}. Happy Feasting.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good afternoon, . Happy Feasting.

Entries.DialogueText: Seeing my little boy happy and healthy is what I'm thankful for. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Seeing my little boy happy and healthy is what I'm thankful for.

Entries.DialogueText: I like winter. It's peaceful.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like winter. It's peaceful.

Entries.DialogueText: You ready for the contest? We all think you're going to win.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You ready for the contest? We all think you're going to win.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh...! Mom used to give me this when I was a young boy. It brings back wonderful memories. Thank you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh...! Mom used to give me this when I was a young boy. It brings back wonderful memories. Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, now this is a really great gift. Thanks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, now this is a really great gift. Thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... It's a... what is this, exactly? Hmm...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... It's a... what is this, exactly? Hmm...

Entries.DialogueText: This... They gave this to me in Gotoro prison camp. I've been trying to forget about that. *shudder*
Entries.DisplayPattern: This... They gave this to me in Gotoro prison camp. I've been trying to forget about that. *shudder*

Entries.DialogueText: That's kind of you. The family will like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's kind of you. The family will like this.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for inviting me to the movies, {Farmer_Name}. It's not easy to adjust back into the civilian lifestyle, but you've helped me feel really welcome.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for inviting me to the movies, . It's not easy to ust back into the civilian lifestyle, but you've helped me feel really welcome.

Entries.DialogueText: This is great... it reminds me of simpler times... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is great... it reminds me of simpler s...

Entries.DialogueText: Kent has a rare smile on his face.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Kent has a rare smile on his face.

Entries.DialogueText: That was fun. When you're engrossed in a movie, all your cares and worries disappear.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was fun. When you're engrossed in a movie, all your cares and worries disappear.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not sure about this movie...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not sure about this movie...

Entries.DialogueText: Kent is breaking out into a cold sweat...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Kent is breaking out into a cold sweat...

Entries.DialogueText: That was challenging for me. Still, I appreciate you inviting me to this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was challenging for me. Still, I appreciate you inviting me to this.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. Enjoying the heat?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . Enjoying the heat?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I've got a few things for sale. Let me know if anything catches your eye.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I've got a few things for sale. Let me know if anything catches your eye.
